channel.title: Market Outlook on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Market Outlook on FinanClub

item.title: KDP
item.description: score:115 Chances: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) is positioned for growth across its beverage categories, including coffee and caffeinated beverages. The company has a strong track record of outperforming its peers and delivering shareholder performance. Keurig Dr Pepper’s product portfolio is broad and includes a wide range of popular beverage brands.

item.title: CRWD
item.description: score:172 Chances: CrowdStrike (CRWD) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Shares of cybersecurity company CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after Morgan Stanley analyst Hamza Fodderwala upgraded the stock’s rating from Equal-Weight (Hold) to Overweight (Buy) and raised the price target from $203 to $304.
